doc:
Theodore Wilson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theodore_Wilson 0 Theodore Rosevelt "Teddy" Wilson (December 10, 1943 – July 21, 1991) was an American stage, film, and television actor. Wilson is best known for his recurring roles as Earl the Postman on the ABC sitcom That's My Mama, and Sweet Daddy Williams on the CBS sitcom Good Times. Theodore_Rosevelt_"_Teddy_"_Wilson ( December_10_,_1943 – July_21_,_1991 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor . Wilson is_best_known for his_recurring_roles as Earl the_Postman on the_ABC_sitcom That 's My_Mama , and Sweet_Daddy_Williams on the_CBS_sitcom Good_Times .
